need-installed-and-permission: You need to install this application and grant notification permissions
browser-doest-support: Your browser does't support this feature
notify-activated: Reminder can be activated. But the background reminder is quite unreliable, you can't rely on it
none-time-fullscreen: Todo without target time cannot be fullscreen
countdown-units: ms| s| min| h| d| week| mo| y| decade| century| millennium
countdown-units-plural: ms| s| mins| h| d| weeks| mo| y| decades| centuries| millennia
critical-error-warn:
This is usually a problem caused by irregular data/version migration. You can try to continue using it by clicking on the blank to turn off the alert, and the suggested actions are shown below

Processed data is acceptable by the app's Import & Export Todo feature, but direct import may still cause the same problem
Multi-storage data is only for export to the app's all dataï¼Œand it is unacceptable by the app's Import & Export Todo feature
export-and-clear-all-data-des: Export & clr all data to try fix
auto-fullscreen-des: Automatic fullscreen the first todo when application startup
multi-storage-des: It may can prevent accidental data loss, but it also will cause a little more storage and response delay
override-import-warn: Override Import will clear the existing todo list!
clear-all-data-warn: All data will be lost forever! (A long time!)
about-app-des: Developed by jiesou and open source community, open source on Github
